alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Highlands and southeastern Polk Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Lake Wales to 9 miles east of Avon Park. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Poinciana, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Frostproof, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Alturas, Indian Lake Estates, Cypress Gardens, Winter Haven Airport, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, Babson Park, Wahneta and Waverly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
